Description: Vodafone UK offers fixed broadband services in the United Kingdom. Vodafone UK is a subsidiary of the multinational telecommunications company Vodafone Group Plc, which operates worldwide with a significant footprint in Europe, Asia, Middle East, and Africa.
AT&T’s fixed broadband service is offered as part of its  Wireline service which provides telephony, internet access, and network integration.

Movistar is a fixed broadband service operated in Spain by Telefónica de España, a subsidiary company of Telefónica, a multinational telecommunications company that also operates in many Latin American countries.
Orange France offers fixed line broadband service in France. Orange France is a subsidiary of Orange S.A. (formerly France Télécom S.A.), a French multinational telecommunications corporation.

Airtel India offers fixed line broadband service across India. Airtel India is a subsidiary of Bharti Airtel Limited, a global telecommunications services company that operates in countries across South Asia and Africa.

Etisalat UAE offers fixed line broadband service in the United Arab Emirates. Etisalat UAE is a subsidiary of Emirates Telecommunications Corporation, a multinational UAE based telecommunications services provider.

Ooredoo Qatar offers fixed-line broadband services in Qatar. It is a subsidiary of Ooredoo Q.S.C. (formerly Qtel), an international telecommunications company headquartered in Qatar with operations across the Middle East, North Africa, and Asia.
